channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Connect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Connect

item.title: CVE-2023-29306|2024-08-02T14:07:46.231Z -- adobe -- adobe%20connect
item.description: Adobe Connect versions 12.3 and earlier are affected by a reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. If an attacker is able to convince a victim to visit a URL referencing a vulnerable page, malicious JavaScript content may be executed within the context of the victim's browser.

item.title: CVE-2023-29305|2024-08-02T14:07:45.800Z -- adobe -- adobe%20connect
item.description: Adobe Connect versions 12.3 and earlier are affected by a reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. If an attacker is able to convince a victim to visit a URL referencing a vulnerable page, malicious JavaScript content may be executed within the context of the victim's browser.
